metadata.name: Galaxy #08
metadata.description:
First, there are the shots taken with
Polaroid cameras. I photographed the landscape. From
Far away, close up. The real. And then there is manipulation of the
material. These images had to be transferred, as were the
as were the images from my previous
work with Polaroid. But a problem with the film manufacturer
But a problem with the film manufacturer put a stop to this technique. Disappointed, I wanted to save
these images. To manipulate them in a different way. In the course of the tests,
I discovered on my "photographic waste" some
matter, shapes, colours. I glimpsed a "cosmic" universe.
"I saw craters, lakes, canyons.
canyons... And spatial colours. That said, as I have no idea what
have no idea what space looks like...
It's all interpretation!
Imaginary planets. Accidental galaxy.

If you buy, you ll get a print 20X20 cm Fine art
